Name: Aatrox
Description: Aatrox is a fallen god-warrior who once wielded his weapon to ensure the victory of his people.

Name: Ahri
Description: Ahri is a nine-tailed fox who charms her enemies and feeds off their life essence to enhance her magic.

Name: Akali
Description: Akali is a rogue assassin who moves through the shadows, seeking vengeance against those who harm her people.

Name: Alistar
Description: Alistar is a mighty minotaur, a protector and a bastion for his allies, with tremendous strength to disrupt his enemies.

Name: Annie
Description: Annie is a young mage with powerful fire magic, able to summon her giant bear, Tibbers, to fight at her side.

Name: Ashe
Description: Ashe is an ice-wielding archer who commands her people with a steady bow and keen eye, always aiming for peace.

Name: Braum
Description: Braum is a kind-hearted protector, using his mighty shield to block damage and support his teammates.

Name: Caitlyn
Description: Caitlyn is the Sheriff of Piltover, a skilled marksman known for her impeccable aim and strategic mind.

Name: Darius
Description: Darius is the hand of Noxus, wielding a massive axe and striking fear into his enemies with raw power.

Name: Lux
Description: Lux is a radiant mage who wields light as her weapon, bringing hope and justice to those in need.

Name: Garen
Description: Garen is a noble warrior of Demacia, who stands ready to protect his people with strength and bravery.

Name: Jinx
Description: Jinx is a chaotic marksman who thrives in causing disorder, using her vast array of explosive weapons.

Name: Lee Sin
Description: Lee Sin is a blind monk who channels his inner energy to unleash powerful attacks against his foes.

Name: Morgana
Description: Morgana is a fallen angel who uses her dark magic to bind her enemies and shield her allies.

Name: Yasuo
Description: Yasuo is a master swordsman of the wind, always searching for redemption as he battles his foes.
